title: Solution: CLAUDE.md Startup Script Path Error
description: Corrected startup script path from incorrect '/root/.claude-multi-agent/scripts/check-graph-status.js' to correct '/root/agents/scripts/claude-startup-check.js'. The check-graph-status.js script checks Neo4j/Redis/TaskMaster which are not relevant to Stand Up Sydney platform. The correct claude-startup-check.js performs Knowledge Graph status, MCP configuration verification, database connectivity, and critical system health checks specific to this platform.
solution: Corrected startup script path from incorrect '/root/.claude-multi-agent/scripts/check-graph-status.js' to correct '/root/agents/scripts/claude-startup-check.js'. The check-graph-status.js script checks Neo4j/Redis/TaskMaster which are not relevant to Stand Up Sydney platform. The correct claude-startup-check.js performs Knowledge Graph status, MCP configuration verification, database connectivity, and critical system health checks specific to this platform.
